eu.amidst.core.classifiers

Interface Classifier

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NaiveBayesClassifier

    public interface Classifier
    The Classifier interface is defined for Bayesian classification models.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getClassName()
      Returns the name of the class variable.
      void learn(DataStream<DataInstance> dataStream)
      Trains the classifier using the input data streams.
      double[] predict(DataInstance instance)
      Predicts the class membership probabilities for a given instance.
      void setClassName(java.lang.String className)
      Sets the name of the class variable.

    • Method Detail

      • predict

        double[] predict(DataInstance instance)
        Predicts the class membership probabilities for a given instance.
        Parameters:
        instance - the data instance to be classified.
        Returns:
        an array of double containing the estimated membership probabilities of the data instance for each class label.

      • getClassName

        java.lang.String getClassName()
        Returns the name of the class variable.
        Returns:
        the name of the class variable.

      • setClassName

        void setClassName(java.lang.String className)
        Sets the name of the class variable.
        Parameters:
        className - the name of the class variable.

      • learn

        void learn(DataStream<DataInstance> dataStream)
        Trains the classifier using the input data streams.
        Parameters:
        dataStream - a data stream DataStream.
